verbs.description: Anthony Scaramucci , who [V: was] hired as the new White House communications director on Friday , has n't always been a fan of President Donald Trump .
[ARG1: Anthony Scaramucci] , [R-ARG1: who] was [V: hired] [ARG2: as the new White House communications director] [ARGM-TMP: on Friday] , has n't always been a fan of President Donald Trump .
Anthony Scaramucci , who was hired as the new White House communications director on Friday , [V: has] n't always been a fan of President Donald Trump .
[ARG1: Anthony Scaramucci , who was hired as the new White House communications director on Friday ,] has [ARGM-NEG: n't] [ARGM-TMP: always] [V: been] [ARG2: a fan of President Donald Trump] .
